text.div:
Influenza (Tests for influenza A or B virus by Culture and Identification Method)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    22826-2 Influenza virus A identified in Unspecified specimen by Bioassay
